metadata.dc:author: Almajano, C
Mateos, J
Pascual, J I
Porras, V
metadata.dc:description: A case of acute urinary retention secondary to a giant bladder diverticulum in a 23-year-old patient is described. Its etiopathogenesis is briefly discussed, highlighting its congenital origin which, in our view, must be based on the histological examination of the specimen.
metadata.dc:title: Divertículo vesical congénito como causa de retención urinaria aguda.
[Congenital bladder diverticulum as a cause of acute urinary retention].
